title: Add --search flag to CLI
description: Add a search utility to search database entries by title or artist

title: Add scrolling support to TUI detail view
description: Enable vertical scrolling in track detail view to read full lyrics

title: Add h/l keys to navigate between songs in detail view
description: Allow left/right navigation (h/l) to view previous/next song while in detail view

title: Add -n flag to count and celebrate database entries
description: Add a count utility that shows total tracks in database with celebration message

title: Highlight now playing song in search results
description: When using -s flag, detect current song and highlight it if present in search results

title: Investigate extracting Spotify track URIs from local APIs
description: Research if MPRIS/AppleScript/PowerShell can provide Spotify track URIs instead of generating IDs client-side

title: Migrate database to use Spotify track URIs
Make NOW PLAYING indicator more prominent in search
description: Add bright colors/highlighting and emoji to make current song stand out
